reviewText:
it is always interesting to see the hunky architect supreme in moving images, with his cigar puffing, suit sleeves rolled up and bald head shining glossily in dark construction sites. The script however, is quite remote from what we know Nouvel since his recent work in, for example, Spain (Agbar) and paris (Musee du Quai Branly).
Of course the Nouvel we know (or at least as I understand / perceive) is still the same Nouvel, but there should a good DVD to witness his latest design.
